title: Smart Data Models - Machine Learning Subscription Query
description: Subscription Query model for Machine Learning models

type.description: Property. It has to be SubscriptionQuery. NGSI entity type. Enum:'SubscriptionQuery'

subscriptionName.description: Property. A (short) name given to this Subscription. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

entities.description: Property. Entity ids, id pattern and Entity types that shall be matched by Entities in order to be retrieved. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

q.description: Property. Query that shall be matched by Entities in order to be retrieved. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

watchedAttributes.description: Property. List of Attributes that shall be matched by Entities in order to be retrieved. If not present all Attributes will be retrieved. Defined in NGSI-LD standard.

notification.description: Property. Parameters of the notification for the subscription. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

geoQ.description: Property. Geo-Query that shall be matched by Entities in order be retrieved. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

csf.description: Property. Context source filter that shall be matched by Context Source Registrations describing Context Sources to be used for retrieving Entities. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

expiresAt.description: Property. Expiration date for the subscription. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

throttling.description: Property. Minimal period of time in seconds which shall elapse between two consecutive notifications. Defined in NGSI-LD standard

temporalQ.description: Property. Temporal Query to be present only for 'Query Temporal Evolution of Entities' operation. Defined in NGSI-LD standard
